title: CryptoAuthentication
extract: Essentially, cryptography means encrypting data by scrambling or encoding the data, rendering it unusable until it is decrypted or unscrambled. ... Cryptoauthentication is a form of hardware security that ensures that the keys being used to encrypt and decrypt data are the real keys associated with that cryptography.Mar 15, 2017
extract_html: Essentially, cryptography means encrypting data by scrambling or encoding the data, rendering it unusable until it is decrypted or unscrambled. ... Cryptoauthentication is a form of hardware security that ensures that the keys being used to encrypt and decrypt data are the real keys associated with that cryptography.Mar 15, 2017
